name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of expertise in delivering high-performance software solutions, proficient in **Python** and **JavaScript** with significant experience in **Django** for backend development. Strongly skilled in building robust **APIs** and adept at internationalization and localization practices to enhance global reach, leveraging tools like **moz-l10n** and **Pontoon**. Extensive knowledge of enhancing applications with support for **Rust** and **C++**, which strengthens the versatility and efficiency of software solutions.

Experienced in deploying cloud-native applications with a focus on scalability and maintainability, while continuously integrating user-centric design and compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in developing enterprise-level systems utilizing microservices architecture, event-driven programming, and CI/CD automation methods to deliver secure and efficient software. Passionate about driving impact through innovative technology solutions and committed to producing high-quality code that meets industry best practices.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions using **Python** and **JavaScript** with modern frontends, ensuring adherence to regulatory standards.
• Developed and integrated **APIs** for project architecture, focusing on internationalization and localization to enhance user experience and accessibility.
• Led the re-architecture of monolithic applications into microservices, employing tools such as Docker and Kubernetes, achieving **99.9% uptime**.
• Utilized **Django** as a framework for building resilient web applications, optimizing performance for large-scale user bases with over **10,000** concurrent users.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of modules, enhancing product localization capabilities with **Rust** for performance-critical components.
• Delivered complex data visualization tools enabling real-time insights, allowing stakeholders to track changes in operational KPIs with **over 50% reduction** in processing time.
• Established test strategies across front-end and back-end services, improving overall code quality and reducing bugs by **30%** through comprehensive test coverage.
• Integrated advanced search capabilities using technologies that enhanced user interactions across millions of records, supporting effective data retrieval in healthcare and finance sectors.
• Contributed to the development of shared libraries and tools such as **moz-l10n** and **Pontoon**, facilitating effective translations and localization efforts across multiple languages.

Utilized **Python** and **JavaScript** to drive the development and modernization of financial platforms by adopting a microservices-based architecture, enhancing scalability and maintainability for high-volume transaction systems.
Designed and implemented **APIs** using **Django** to support integration with internal and third-party services, ensuring seamless data exchange and interoperability.
Developed robust and reliable applications to support **internationalization** and **localization** requirements, leveraging tools such as **moz-l10n** and **Pontoon** for efficient language translations.
Led the front-end architecture using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to build dynamic user interfaces, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement across financial dashboards and admin portals.
Built real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing operations teams to track over **9,000** financial activities daily and detect anomalies promptly.
Integrated **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to establish a robust event-driven system, enhancing the throughput of transactions and alerts by **25%** for compliance workflows.
Developed and orchestrated **ETL** pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from more than **5** internal and third-party sources.
Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems with **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns to proactively flag suspicious activities, resulting in a **15%** reduction in fraudulent transactions.
Created machine learning pipelines for credit scoring and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference directly into backend services for real-time decision-making.

Utilized **Python** (specifically **Django**) and **JavaScript** frameworks to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, achieving high availability and low latency across modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Developed and integrated RESTful **APIs** to streamline communication between frontend and backend systems, enhancing functionality and user experience.
Implemented strategies for **internationalization** and **localization** to ensure the platform catered to diverse global markets, increasing user engagement by **30%** in targeted regions.
Engineered real-time order updates and features using **WebSockets**, **Kafka**, and **RabbitMQ**, which improved responsiveness by **25%** and enhanced customer support capabilities.
Designed efficient and responsive frontend applications utilizing **React 18** and **Vue 3**, paired with **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit**, boosting user satisfaction metrics by **15%**.
Conducted performance tuning with **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring fault-tolerant data access even during peak traffic, with a system capable of handling **up to 10,000** transactions per second.
Integrated with AI/ML-powered recommendation engines utilizing **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, resulting in increased conversion rates by **20%** based on real-time behavioral data.
Established robust caching mechanisms with **Redis**, significantly improving product metadata retrieval speeds and reducing read pressure on databases by **40%**.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployment strategies using **LaunchDarkly** and Kubernetes, facilitating controlled rollouts and enabling A/B testing for major updates, reducing deployment risks by **50%**.
Created SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs with **Next.js** and **HTML5/CSS3**, ensuring mobile-first engagement and compliance with **WCAG 2.1**, thereby widening user accessibility.
Built secure payment processing workflows integrated with **Stripe** and **PayPal**, employing tokenization and PCI compliance protocols to safeguard sensitive data.
Applied robust access controls using **RBAC** and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring secure customer and admin access in compliance with GDPR standards.
